sentences.sContent: Serious eye strain can lead to persistent headaches, muscle pain in the head, neck and upper back, as well as long term problems like myopia.
sentences.sContent_eng: Serious eye strain can lead to persistent headaches, muscle pain in the head, neck and upper back, as well as long term problems like myopia.
sentences.sCn: 严重的眼疲劳会导致长期的头痛，头部，颈部和上发背的肌肉疼痛，也可能会引起一个长期的问题近视。

sentences.sContent: But what the alcohol myopia model does provide is a very intuitive and easily understood way of thinking about how alcohol affects us, for better and worse.
sentences.sContent_eng: But what the alcohol myopia model does provide is a very intuitive and easily understood way of thinking about how alcohol affects us, for better and worse.
sentences.sCn: 但酒精近视这一概念，对与我们理解酒精对我们的影响，无论是好是坏，都提供一种非常直觉的，易于理解的方式。

sentences.sContent: Cataract surgery corrects the myopia as well as the cataract.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cataract surgery corrects the myopia as well as the cataract.
sentences.sCn: 白内障手术可在治愈白内障的同时纠正近视。

synos.tran: [眼科]近视；目光短浅，缺乏远见

phrases.pCn: 营销近视，经营短视症；行销短视（症）

remMethod.val: my(闭上) + op(眼睛) + ia(表病) → 近视

trans.tranOther: the inability to see clearly things that are far away
